EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Global_Email_BK_Piece-Part-Promotion_amr.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Piece Part Promotion!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BendixKing Piece Part Promotion BendixKing is pleased to announce a repair partner promotion for piece parts sales. The promotion offers a 100% in-kind contribution match toward your 2020 royalty discount for purchases that ship during the fourth quarter of 2019.
Items are offered at their standard dealer price with regular applicable discounts. For the most current pricing, or to order products referenced in this sales bulletin, please go to the Honeywell portal <[[https://aerospace2.honeywell.com/onlineordering/ordering/OOPriceAvail ]]>.
To see full terms and conditions as well as additional information please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/BendixKing%20Repair%20Partner%202019.pdf]]>.
For tracking purposes, please send Dan Bilunas (dan.bilunas@bendixking.com <[[mailt:dan.bilunas@bendixking.com]]>) your Honeywell sales order number.
For questions regarding technical support please use the following contact information:
Technical Support US & Canada: 1-855-250-7027 All other countries: 1-505-903-6148 Email: techsupport@bendixking.com <[[mailt:techsupport@bendixking.com]]>
